title: E-Learning Sustainability Strategies in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and foundational understanding of field-specific concepts
context.additional_context: Professionals emphasizing job relevance, conducting learning in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more sustainable utilization strategies for e-learning resources in blended learning environments.
Learners can practice modifying and adapting existing e-learning content to new educational contexts.
In project-based assessment tasks, learners can exchange peer feedback at least twice using digital collaboration tools.
Learners can write four or more reflection journals to resolve issues arising during e-learning operations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
